name: Every Extend Extra
overview: Start a chain reaction! Extend yourself into an unknown universe where your only chance for success is through perfectly timed destruction. Every Extend Extra fuses together futuristic puzzle, shooter, and musical elements to create an electrifying battle experience like no other. Choose from 5 addictive game modes including wireless head-to-head play. Experience the fusion of hypnotic visuals, pulsating music, and ingenious puzzle action.
